actions.name: complete_task
actions.description: Marks an existing task as completed.

actions.name: create_task
actions.description: Creates a new in a specific list.

actions.name: find_task
actions.description: Finds tasks in a specific project by their title.

actions.name: get_project
actions.description: Retrieves the details of a specific task list by ID.

actions.name: get_task
actions.description: Retrieves the details of a specific task.

triggers.name: new_task_created
triggers.description: Triggers when a new task is created in a selected project.
